pkgmetadata.longdescription:
emojify substitutes emoji aliases (:scream: for example) that many services (like GitHub) use for emoji raw characters.
For a list of aliases you can use, see https://github.com/mrowa44/emojify/blob/master/emojify#L28
or at
https://github.com/ikatyang/emoji-cheat-sheet/blob/master/README.md
